item.title: Adding attack requirement
item.dc:creator: @Kingen50cent Kingen50cent
item.description:
@Kingen50cent wrote:

Ok in my server you need 5 slayer to attack a basilisk for example
i want it so you can attack it even if your lvl 1 slayer.

	[code]if (type == 1616) {
		if (playerLevel[18] < 5) {

sM(“You must be level 5 slayer or higher to attack this monster.”);
ResetAttackNPC();
return false;[/code]
That is the code
Should i remove the whole code without this & replace the “5” with a “1” like this:

if (type == 1616) { if (playerLevel[18] < 1) {

Read full topic
